citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 am on
07-Dec-16.
Inspector spoke with facility representative via phone. He is not available at this time for an inspection.
